message.content:
cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.GT 

The paper focuses on the dissemination and promotion of user-generated multimedia content on online platforms, which falls under the scope of social media and online information retrieval. Therefore, cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.MM (Multimedia) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of recommendation lists and re-ranking mechanisms, which are related to information retrieval and ranking algorithms, suggesting cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as another possible sub-category. The problem of optimizing promotion strategies in a competitive environment involves game theory, which is covered by cs.GT (Game Theory) and the use of optimization techniques, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
